description: white, yellow, red, green; dark red velvet completely covered with appliqued designs using sequins; yellow metal; small white round braid in curly designs; six stiff peaks with pompoms; front has stiff, crown-like, free-standing piece; ear flaps; PL tie; quilted lining; chin strap
title: Child's Hat
